## Money interface

A Money object defines a monetary value, including a numeric value and a currency code.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Money 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [currency?](./magento-api.money.currency.md) | Maybe&lt;[CurrencyEnum](./magento-api.currencyenum.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> A three-letter currency code, such as USD or EUR |
|  [value?](./magento-api.money.value.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Float'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> A number expressing a monetary value |
